name: Flu
precautions: Get vaccinated, avoid close contact with sick people

name: Cold
precautions: Wash hands frequently, avoid touching face

name: Hypertension
symptoms: often none, headache, shortness of breath
causes: Genetics, poor diet, lack of exercise

name: Heart Disease
causes: Genetics, poor diet, lack of exercise
precautions: Healthy diet, regular exercise, avoid smoking

name: Stroke
causes: Blocked blood flow to the brain

name: Osteoporosis
treatment: Medications, calcium and vitamin D supplements

name: Arthritis
precautions: Maintain a healthy weight, stay active

name: Tuberculosis
precautions: Vaccination, avoid close contact with infected individuals

name: Peptic Ulcer
treatment: Antacids, antibiotics if caused by H. pylori
causes: H. pylori infection, long-term NSAID use

name: Chronic Fatigue Syndrome
causes: Unknown, may involve immune system dysfunction

name: Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder
precautions: Seek therapy, build a support system

name: Eating Disorders
precautions: Seek help, build a support system

name: Tendinitis
precautions: Avoid repetitive motions, warm-up before activity

name: Shin Splints
precautions: Proper footwear, gradual increase in activity

name: Chronic Bronchitis
precautions: Avoid smoking, reduce exposure to pollutants

name: Gallstones
causes: Imbalance in substances that make up bile

name: Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT)
precautions: Stay active, avoid long periods of immobility

name: Acid Reflux
precautions: Avoid trigger foods, eat smaller meals

name: Shingles
precautions: Vaccination, avoid contact with pregnant women

name: Measles
precautions: Vaccination, avoid contact with infected individuals

name: Heart Failure
causes: Coronary artery disease, high blood pressure

name: Multiple Myeloma
causes: Abnormal plasma cells in bone marrow

name: Cystic Fibrosis
precautions: Regular medical check-ups, adherence to treatment

name: Rheumatoid Arthritis
precautions: Regular exercise, maintain a healthy weight

name: Endometriosis
causes: Endometrial tissue growth outside the uterus

name: Cerebral Palsy
causes: Brain injury or abnormal brain development

name: Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome (ARDS)
precautions: Avoid smoking, maintain a healthy lifestyle

name: Sepsis
precautions: Prompt treatment of infections, good hygiene

name: West Nile Virus
causes: West Nile virus from mosquito bites

name: Lyme Disease
precautions: Avoid tick bites, check for ticks after outdoor activities

name: Rocky Mountain Spotted Fever
precautions: Avoid tick bites, check for ticks after outdoor activities

name: Scabies
precautions: Avoid close contact, wash clothes regularly

name: Ringworm
precautions: Good hygiene, avoid sharing personal items

name: Vitamin D Deficiency
precautions: Get sunlight, eat vitamin D-rich foods

name: Sleep Apnea
precautions: Maintain a healthy weight, avoid alcohol
